sent.orig: The soul of criminal legislation and criminal justice is criminal policy.
sent.trans: 刑事立法与刑事司法的灵魂是刑事政策。

sent.orig: Criminal jurisprudence is a science of criminal legislation and criminal judicature, it include two parts.
sent.trans: 刑法学是以刑法的立法和司法实践为研究对象的科学。

sent.orig: Criminal responsibility is the core of criminal legislation and criminal justice.
sent.trans: 刑事责任是刑事立法和刑事司法的核心。

sent.orig: Criminal silence right and criminal detection behavior belong to criminal detection work.
sent.trans: 刑事沉默权与刑事侦查行为同属刑事侦查工作的两个方面。

sent.orig: The judicial organs shall investigate the criminal responsibilities of those who violate the criminal law.
sent.trans: 对触犯刑律的人员，由司法机关依法追究刑事责任。
